content.rendered:
Please note that online requests for technical support must be made via our Support Center portal. See below for details.

Hours of Service

Participants in Cambium Care Prime, Advanced and Pro will receive immediate service 24 x 7 x 365. Otherwise a ticket will be opened, and we will work on the request during the customer’s business hours, Monday through Friday.

Support Center Portal

The Support Center portal is at support.cambiumnetworks.com. To submit a request for technical support or RMA assistance online:

  1. Log into the portal with your Cambium Single Sign-On (SSO) and password
  2. Click “Submit A Request”
  3. Select the appropriate request form
  4. Complete the form, and a ticket will be opened

A detailed guide for submitting a technical support request is provided in this video.

Call Us

If you would prefer to open a ticket via phone, please see the list of numbers below. Select from four options:

  1. Technical Support
  2. Sales
  3. Customer Care
  4. General Inquiries

United States and Canada

US – Toll Free: +1-888-863-5250

Canada – Toll Free: +1-888-863-5250

Europe, Middle East & Africa

Italy – Rome: +39-0694800825

United Kingdom – London: +44-2033181971

Germany – National: +0800-183-3328

Ireland – National: +353-766060030

France – Paris: +33-176637396

South Africa – Pretoria: +27-120042323

Russia – Moscow: +7-499-9186585

Poland – National: +48221043651

Asia / Pacific

New Zealand – Auckland: +64-98010033

Hong Kong – Local: +852-300-85646

Singapore – National: +65-31582543

India – Freephone: 000-800-100-4101

Caribbean and Latin America

Argentina – Buenos Aires: +54-1159841322

Brazil – Rio de Janeiro: +55-2140421290

Chile – Santiago: +56-229382540

Colombia – Bogota: +57-13819480

Mexico – Mexico City: +52-5547469747

Peru – Lima: +51-17073811

Puerto Rico – San Juan: +1-787-303-0351
